item.title: Funeral Celebrancy
item.description: Llew King Celebrant We humans are wired to be relational beings who are closely connected to family & friends. When a loved-one passes away we feel the pain deep with-in us. At the time it feels unreal, even surreal – we need someone to give us the advice we need for all that is taking place & needs to take place, for example : Pre-funeral advice Planning the funeral Conducting the funeral Post-funeral help Please contact me if you require Funeral Celebrant services.

item.title: Testimonials
item.description: Testimonial I can highly recommend Llew as a funeral celebrant for anyone who wants a service filled with dignity and that personal touch which helps make the day a memorable one for family and friends. Llew is a helpful and compassionate person, He can facilitate a simple, no fuss service to a more contemporary celebration of a life with, or without, spiritual content. He is professional in his approach, being there at all stages of the planning, helping people to relax, guiding them through the service, incorporating the ideas and wishes of the family, and making suggestions from his years of experience.

item.title: About Celebrancy for Life
item.description: Over the past 35 years, I have had the amazing privilege and honour of being involved with people at significant times in their lives. I have helped people celebrate and mourn in a way that is unique and meaningful and planned by their family. In doing so, I have developed the compassion needed to help people face the challenges of life and walk the journey. Llew pictured with Ann, his wife of over 43 years.
